description.content: Noble Life is proud to present our flagship experience: the Noble Dinner Show & Safari, Dubai’s most celebrated desert experience.

After venturing deep into the golden dunes, you’ll experience the adrenaline of dune bashing, the thrill of sandboarding, and a pause for breathtaking sunset photos. For those seeking more excitement, optional quad bikes and dune buggies are available before arriving at the iconic Noble Camp.

An Instagram favourite and recognised with a TripAdvisor Traveller Choice Award with over 5,000 five-star TripAdvisor reviews, the evening continues with camel rides, falcon encounters, henna artistry, Arabic hospitality, and our new world-class dinner show ‘Noble Desert Mirage’ - with live performances and the unforgettable Noble Fire Show.

content: Luxury hotel pickup & drop-off in Noble’s private 4×4 vehicles
Dune bashing adventure and sandboarding on golden desert slopes
Pause for breathtaking sunset photography atop the dunes
Optional quad bike or dune buggy rides for thrill seekers
Warm welcome at Noble Camp with Arabic coffee, Luqaimat sweets, and traditional hospitality
Explore a souq-style camp with Noble-branded goods and local handicrafts
Camel rides, baby camel feeding, henna artistry, and falcon photo opportunities
Dedicated children’s play area for young adventurers
Dining choices: lavish BBQ buffet or VIP 4-course chef’s menu with premium service
Evening entertainment featuring nine exclusive live performances including live singer, cultural dances, and the Noble Fire Show
Licensed bar available with house beverages included in Platinum option
Return transfer to your hotel around 9:30 PM

Tea/coffee, Luqaimat traditional sweet, and unlimited soft drinks
Baby camel feeding and adult camel ride at Noble Camp

Quad Bike & Dune Buggy Ride (available for purchase onsite)

blocks.data: What is the difference between the Noble Dinner Show Only & Noble Dinner Show & Safari? The Noble Dinner Show & Safari package includes an adventurous desert experience before the dinner show (Noble Desert Mirage). Guests will visit the quad and buggy zone, go dune bashing, and try sandboarding. The Dinner Show only package starts later, with a pickup at 14:00, and guests are taken directly to the camp, skipping the desert adventure activities.
Are pets allowed?Unfortunately, pets are not allowed at our camp. However, we have our own friendly animals that guests can enjoy and interact with.

What are the children's rates?Children aged 0-2 years can join for free. For children aged 3-12 years, there is a special rate of 270 AED for all packages. From the age of 12, they are charged the adult rate.

Do you offer vegetarian meals?Yes, we offer a variety of vegetarian dishes. Vegetarian meals are available both in the buffet and in the 4-course set menu, providing a range of delicious options for our guests.
